patterns_discovered: Using OKLCH color space for consistent color definitions
Maintaining separate color variables for light and dark themes
Adding semantic color variables (--info) to the color palette
gotchas_discovered: Precise OKLCH values require careful selection for consistent visual design

approach_outcome.changes_implemented: Added --info CSS variable with light and dark theme values

recommendations: Continue using OKLCH for color definitions for better color consistency
Maintain a systematic approach to adding semantic color variables
Document the rationale behind specific OKLCH color choices
